alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Navarro (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 16 at 6:19PM CDT until March 16 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL ELLIS AND NORTH CENTRAL NAVARRO COUNTIES... At 619 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Waxahachie, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Waxahachie, Ennis, Palmer, Maypearl, Bardwell, Alma, Bardwell Lake, Garrett, Bristol, Emhouse, Reagor Springs, Ike, Avalon, Forreston, Crisp, Five Points, Howard and Boyce. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central Texas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection stay inside a sturdy structure and keep away from windows. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately.
